      "backgroundColor": "#FFFFFF"

      "drawsContent": false

      "bounds": [757, 152],
      "drawsContent": false,
      "contentsVisible": false
    },

      "name": "LayoutImage IMG class='visible composited box'",
      "position": [38, 338],
      "bounds": [100, 100],
      "drawsContent": false

  ]
}
